incidents.name: Support Service Disruption on Twilio Console

incident_updates.body: Our engineers investigated a customer impact of a retroactive issue with Support Service Disruption on Twilio Console that was degraded for 30 minutes between 3:10 PM and 3:40 PM Pacific Time on 01/04/2023.  During this period, customers may have experienced issues with appropriately submitting tickets, chat with agents, view their ticket history, or see their current support plan during the outage window.

incidents.name: The Support Plans Page in the Console Is Now Fully Operational

incident_updates.body: The support plans page in the console was degraded for approximately 30 minutes between 3:10:59PM and 3:43:03 PM PT on 01/04/2023. During that time, customers were not able to access the page or upgrade their support plan. The issue has now been resolved.

affected_components.name: DEVELOPER TOOLS - Console

incidents.name: All systems are operational

incident_updates.body: We have fully investigated the issue affecting the support plans page and it was determined that there is no noticeable customer impact. All systems are operational.

incidents.name: Delays in Bulk Export Tool via Twilio Rest API

incident_updates.body: Delays in Bulk Export Tool via Twilio Rest API has been resolved.

affected_components.name: DEVELOPER TOOLS - Bulk Export

incident_updates.body: Bulk Export Tool is now operating normally and customer should be able to use the functionality now.  We will continue to monitor for system stability. We’ll provide another update in 30 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: DEVELOPER TOOLS - Bulk Export

incident_updates.body:
We continue to investigate elevated latency and timeout errors for Twilio Rest API, impacting the following Twilio services: Bulk exports. Customers may experience inaccurate estimated completion times. All new and existing bulk exports will not be completed until the issue is resolved. We recommend waiting to submit any new requests until the issue is resolved. 

Our engineering team is actively working on this issue and we will provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: DEVELOPER TOOLS - Bulk Export

We recommend waiting to submit any new requests until the issue is resolved. 

Our engineering team is actively working on this issue and we will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: Increased latencies and error rate in Conversations

incident_updates.body: Conversations was degraded for 20 minutes between 01:25 and 01:45 Pacific Time on 01/09/2023. During this period, customers may have experienced latencies and error rate. The issue has now been resolved.

affected_components.name: PROGRAMMABLE MESSAGING - Conversations
